text:
Asahi-chan,
It's been a while since we've had a lesson together, hasn't it?

Jeez, Asahi-chan, you seem so down~
Isn't that going to make the lesson go badly?

──Indeed, as Mei said,
Doing this in this state would just be a waste of time

So─
─Before we start, let's talk a bit

Right away, Asahi...
Tell us about yourself

Huh,
what's this all of a sudden?

You know what she said, right?
Let's get to know each other

Even though you always do whatever you want, everyone
is drawn to you ...That's what they say about idols like you
I'm criticizing you with all my might

Everyone keeps saying how amazing you are...
Yet lately, you haven't shown a single happy expression

Fuyuko can't understand at all
I don't understand you

...I don't really get much joy out of
being praised or climbing higher

──Then tell us, Asahi
Why are you doing idol activities?

I... want to do what I want...
I want to give the best performance... If I can do that...

? Are we rehearsing together?
Then what's the position──

Hold on
...Before that, Asahi, watch from there
